title: Incorrect display value for code
guidance: Code display values are not usually used, except for human readability. Incorrect display values are acceptable for reporting to NHSN

rules.regex: ^Wrong Display Name '.*' for .* should be .*'.*' .*

title: Unknown Code System
guidance: This is an unrecognized code system and is only a concern if there is not another coding that provides a standard recognized coding Code System (which is categorized as 'Missing Standard [X] Code')

rules.regex: ^Unknown Code System '.*'$
A code with no system .* A system should be provided
^CodeSystem is unknown and can't be validated
Unknown code 'https?://fhir\.cerner\.com/.*' for in-memory expansion of ValueSet
Unknown code 'https?://open\.epic\.com/FHIR/StructureDefinition/.*' for in-memory expansion of ValueSet
Unknown code 'urn:oid:1\.2\.840\.114350\..*' for in-memory expansion of ValueSet
Unknown code 'urn:oid:1\.2\.246\.537\.6\.96.*' for in-memory expansion of ValueSet

title: Unresolved Code System
guidance: This is an unrecognized code system and is only a concern if there is not another coding that provides a standard recognized coding Code System (which is categorized as 'Missing Standard [X] Code')

rules.regex: ^URL value '.*' does not resolve
\.coding\[[0-9]+\]\.system

title: Invalid Code in required ValueSet
guidance: A required code was missing. This may cause issues with measure calculation.

rules.regex: ^error$
^code-invalid$

title: Can't validate code
guidance: The terminology server should be reviewed.

rules.regex: ^The system .* was found but did not contain enough information to properly validate the code \(mode = fragment\) \(from Tx-Server\)

title: Unresolved Epic Code System URI
guidance: This is an Epic-defined code system and is only a concern if there is not another coding that provides a standard recognized coding Code System (which is categorized as 'Missing Standard [X] Code')

rules.regex: ^Code System URI 'urn:oid:1\.2\.840\.114350.*' is unknown so the code cannot be validated
^Code System URI 'https?://.*epic\.com/.*' is unknown so the code cannot be validated

title: Unresolved Medispan Code System URI
guidance: This is a Medispan-defined code system and is only a concern if there is not another coding that provides a standard recognized coding Code System (which is categorized as 'Missing Standard [X] Code')

rules.regex: ^Code System URI 'urn:oid:2\.16\.840\.1\.113883\.6\.68' is unknown so the code cannot be validated

title: Unresolved and Unrecognized Code System URI
guidance: This is an unrecognized code system and is only a concern if there is not another coding that provides a standard recognized coding Code System (which is categorized as 'Missing Standard [X] Code')

rules.regex: ^Code System URI '.*' is unknown so the code cannot be validated
https?://.+epic\.com

title: Invalid code
guidance: The code is not recognized to be part of the ValueSet. This may cause issues with measure calculation

rules.regex: ^Unknown Code '.*' in the system '.*'; The provided code .* is not in the value set '.*'
Unknown code '.*' for in-memory expansion of ValueSet '.*'

title: Unknown Extension
guidance: Systems are allowed to include extensions (additional data). Extensions that do not modify the meaning of the data (modifierExtensions) can be safely ignored. This is not a modifierExtension.

rules.regex: ^The extension .* is unknown, and not allowed here$
Unknown extension https?://fhir-ehr\.cerner\.com/.*
Unknown extension https?://electronichealth\.se/.*
Unknown extension https?://open\.epic\.com/.*
Unknown extension https?://hl7\.org/fhir/us/core/.*
Extension url 'https?://hl7\.org/fhir/5\.0/StructureDefinition/extension.*' is not valid.*
Unknown extension https?://hl7\.org/fhir/5\.0/StructureDefinition/extension.*
Unknown extension https?://nictiz\.nl/.*
Unknown extension http://terminology\.hl7\.org/CodeSystem/data-absent-reason

title: Additional data beyond NHSN specification
guidance: No impact to normal operation. Recommend reviewing during onboarding and initial testing.

rules.regex: ^This element does not match any known slice defined in the profile

title: Unable to match profile
guidance: This could indicate an underlying issue in the resource (the resource is not validating). FHIR SME may need to review.

rules.regex: ^Unable to find a match for profile .* among choices:
^Profile reference '.*' has not been checked because it is unknown

title: Does not match preferred ValueSet
guidance: This could be indicative of a problem if the data element is part of the measure and would not enable the resource to be included in the measure calculation appropriately.

rules.regex: ^None of the codings provided are in the value set '.*' .*, and a coding is recommended to come from this value set

title: Possible matching profile
guidance: This could indicate an underlying issue in the resource (the resource is not validating).

rules.regex: ^Details for .* matching against Profile

title: FHIR Standard Recommendations and Best Practices
guidance: While it is encouraged to follow FHIR standards and best practices for interoperability, resolutions to these issues are not required for reporting to NHSN.

rules.regex: ^No code provided, and a code should be provided from the value set '.*' \(http:\/\/hl7\.org\/fhir\/ValueSet\/identifier-type\|4\.0\.1\)
^No code provided, and a code should be provided from the value set '.*' \(http:\/\/hl7\.org\/fhir\/ValueSet\/marital-status\|4\.0\.1\)
^No code provided, and a code should be provided from the value set '.*' \(http:\/\/hl7\.org\/fhir\/ValueSet\/observation-interpretation\|4\.0\.1\)
^No code provided, and a code should be provided from the value set '.*' \(http:\/\/hl7\.org\/fhir\/ValueSet\/subscriber-relationship\|4\.0\.1\)

title: MedicationRequest.requester does not have a proper reference
guidance: No identity or reference for requester (Provider). Safe to ignore when ordering provider is not needed.

rules.regex: A Reference without an actual reference or identifier should have a display
Bundle.entry\[\d+\]\.resource\.ofType\(MedicationRequest\)\.where\(id = '.*'\)\.requester

title: Patient Resource Whitespace
guidance: Leading and/or trailing whitespaces were identified at the problematic locations. NHSN has deemed that leading/trailing whitespaces found within the Patient resource are unacceptable for reporting data to NHSN.  Please review the problematic Patient(s) record within your EHR and remove any leading/trailing whitespaces found within Patient chart (typically a face sheet) in the following fields: MRN, First/Last name, Home Address, Telephone, Email address. If no whitespace is found, hospital is advised to coordinate with its EHR vendor, as issue resolution may require EHR vendor FHIR data cleanup via API or database (i.e. not accessible via EHR user interface).

rules.regex: ^value should not start or finish with whitespace '.*'
resource\.ofType\(Patient\)

title: No measure score allowed with cohort
guidance: The MeasureReport violates a business rule regarding MeasureScore. This issue does not impact metric calculation or NHSN's data pipeline, and therefore is acceptable for reporting data into NHSN.

rules.regex: ^No measureScore when the scoring of the message is ''cohort''

title: Non-Patient Resource Whitespace
guidance: A leading or trailing whitespaces were identified at the problematic locations. Whitespaces found in any non-Patient resource are acceptable for data reporting to NHSN.

rules.regex: ^value should not start or finish with whitespace '.*'
resource\.ofType\(Patient\)

title: Minimum slice occurrence not met
guidance: This is likely a secondary issue. If the resource can't validate then it can't be counted as meeting the slicing requirements. Likely addressing the underlying issue will make this issue go away.

rules.regex: ^Bundle.entry:.*: minimum required = .*, but only found .* \(.*\)

title: Link Error using old URL
guidance: This is an issue with NHSNLink (using an old url) and should be reported in Jira.

rules.regex: https?:\/\/lantanagroup\.com\/fhir\/nhsn-measures

title: No codes from an extensible binding ValueSet
guidance: The code provided is not part of the extensible ValueSet, which if it is a concept that is part of the measure, is a problem that needs to be resolved.

rules.regex: None of the codings provided are in the value set '.*' \(.*\), and a coding should come from this value set unless it has no suitable code \(note that the validator cannot judge what is suitable\)

The value provided \('[^']*'\) is not in the value set 'USPS Two Letter Alphabetic Codes' \(http:\/\/hl7\.org\/fhir\/us\/core\/ValueSet\/us-core-usps-state\|(?:\d+\.\d+\.\d+)?\), and a code should come from this value set unless it has no suitable code \(note that the validator cannot judge what is suitable\)
Could not confirm that the codes provided are in the value set \'.*\' \(http\:\/\/terminology\.hl7\.org\/ValueSet\/.*\)\, and a code should come from this value set unless it has no suitable code .*

The Coding provided \(.*\) is not in the value set '.*' \(.*\), and a code should come from this value set unless it has no suitable code (note that the validator cannot judge what is suitable).*'http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ActEncounterCode'
^None of the codings provided are in the value set '.*' .*, and a coding should come from this value set unless it has no suitable code \(note that the validator cannot judge what is suitable\)

title: Unable to validate measure (Measure not found)
guidance: This appears to be an issue in the validation process and should be resolved as it may be hiding other issues.

rules.regex: Canonical URL 'http://www\.cdc\.gov/nhsn/fhirportal/dqm/ig/Measure/.*' does not resolve
The Measure '.*' could not be resolved, so no validation can be performed against the Measure

title: Unresolved URL
guidance: The URL in the validation details is not resolvable. Link may not have the profiles/resources loaded that are represented by the canonical URL.

rules.regex: Canonical URL '.*' does not resolve

title: Invalid dateTime format.
guidance: A date-time format must include the timezone offset for precision. Captured as +/-zzzz.

rules.regex: date has a time, it must have a timezone.*

title: Expected code not found for Encounter class
guidance: Encounter class is expected to contain a code from here (https://terminology.hl7.org/5.0.0/ValueSet-v3-ActEncounterCode.html). However, a code outside of this ValueSet is acceptbale for reporting into NHSN given a standard Encounter.type and/or Location code exist.

rules.regex: The Coding provided \(.*\) is not in the value set 'V3 Value SetActEncounterCode'
Bundle.entry\[\d+\]\.resource\.ofType\(Encounter\)\.where\(id = '.*'\)\.class

title: Embedded HTML Found
guidance: The text contians content that appears to be an embedded HTML tag(s). If this content is rendered to HTML without appropriate post-processing, it may be a security risk. NHSN has deemed with issue acceptable for reporting into NHSN.

rules.regex: The string value contains text that looks like embedded HTML tags\. If this content is rendered to HTML without appropriate post-processing, it may be a security risk
The markdown contains content that appears to be an embedded HTML tag starting at '.*'

title: Illegal Character in XML
guidance: The text contains characters that are illegal in FHIR XML - please check for data integrity.

rules.regex: This content includes the characters? .+ \(hex values?\)\.

title: Unreasonable Decimal
guidance: A value was found to be outside the range of reasonable decimals - please check for data accuracy.

rules.regex: The value '.*' is outside the range of commonly/reasonably supported decimals

title: Unreasonable Unit of Time
guidance: A value was found to be outside the range of reasonable years - please check for data accuracy.

rules.regex: The value '.*' is outside the range of reasonable years - check for data entry error

title: Invalid Period Date Range
guidance: The end dateTime occurs before the start dateTime for specified Period. When a start and end dateTime is present, end must not be earlier than start.

rules.regex: Rule per-1: '.*' Failed

title: Invalid Condition Code
guidance: Use of proprietary code systems and codes may lead to misinterpretation issues. A SNOMED or ICD code is required for condition.code.

rules.regex: Unknown code '.*' for in-memory expansion of ValueSet 'http://hl7\.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet/us-core-condition-code'

title: Missing RxNorm Medication Code
guidance: For recorded Medication, a valid rxnorm code is required.

rules.regex: No code provided, and a code should be provided from the value set 'US Core Medication Codes (RxNorm)'

title: Missing Standard Procedure Code
guidance: For recorded Procedures, a valid US Core Procedure code is required. Valid codes are defined by US Core Procedure Code ValueSet

rules.regex: No code provided, and a code should be provided from the value set 'US Core Procedure Codes'

title: Missing Coverage Type
guidance: Coverage.class.type (when present), is required to exist. However, NHSN has deemed this missing concept acceptable for reportability to NHSN.

rules.regex: Coverage\.class\.type: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Missing Medication Route
guidance: Medication route is required to be present and to contain at least a valid SNOMED code when sending MedicationRequest and MedicationAdministration data to NHSN.

rules.regex: MedicationRequest\.dosageInstruction\.route: minimum required = 1, but only found 0
MedicationAdministration\.dosage\.route: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Missing Location Period
guidance: NHSN requires Encounter location period to be present and overlapping the measure reporting period. If you believe this is a data entry issue that can/should be rectified by a user in the EHR, please resolve and re-submit. For all other inquiries, please submit the issue in a NHSN ServiceNow ticket

rules.regex: Encounter\.location\.period: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Missing Annotation Text
guidance: Annotation.text element was found to be missing, and it is required for reporting to NHSN. If you believe this is a data entry issue that can/should be rectified by a user in the EHR, please resolve and re-submit. For all other inquiries, please submit the issue in a NHSN ServiceNow ticket.

rules.regex: Annotation\.text: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Missing Specimen Type
guidance: Specimen.type element was found to be missing, and it is required for reporting to NHSN. If you believe this is a data entry issue that can/should be rectified by a user in the EHR, please resolve and re-submit. For all other inquiries, please submit the issue in a NHSN ServiceNow ticket

rules.regex: Specimen\.type: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Missing Location Type
guidance: Location.type element was found to be missing, and it is required for reporting to NHSN. If you believe this is a data entry issue that can/should be rectified by a user in the EHR, please resolve and re-submit. For all other inquiries, please submit the issue in a NHSN ServiceNow ticket

rules.regex: Location\.type: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Missing Device Type
guidance: Device.type element was found to be missing, and it is required for reporting to NHSN. If you believe this is a data entry issue that can/should be rectified by a user in the EHR, please resolve and re-submit. For all other inquiries, please submit the issue in a NHSN ServiceNow ticket.

rules.regex: Device\.type: minimum required = 1, but only found 0

title: Observations must have a results or reference component results (us-core-2).
guidance: Observations must have one of the following: a single result (.value), component results, .hasMember, or .dataAbsentReason. Observations were found that do not contain any of these elements, and NHSN has deemed these Observations unacceptable for reporting.

rules.regex: Rule us-core-2: '.*' Failed

title: Missing Patient Name
guidance: Patient.name is required and was found to be missing

rules.regex: Rule us-core-8: '.*' Failed
